title: Liquid Wind
creator_credit: Holly North, Peter Hellman and Greg Battye
brief_description: Liquid Wind takes learners from the very basics of sensing wind direction, rigging the board, sailing theory and techniques, and safety, to sailing in stronger winds and using a harness. The instruction is compatible with the ACABSI Elementary I syllabus.
creator_credit_for_label: Holly North, Peter Hellman and Greg Battye
